Name: Amara May
Review Text: What great customer service. Owner was helpful in getting my order delivered to the correct address and the driver was also friendly. Food was delicious and well priced.

Name: Amara May
Review Text: ordered the tom kha tofu (clearly marked as vegetarian) and found bits of chicken in it. pad phed (red curry) also very dry, sour, and disappointing. staff lovely but won't be ordering from here again.

Name: Amara May
Review Text: Just had my first order. It was DELICIOUS! Papaya salad... was sooo good! Fried rice was a great surprise! Usually those are pretty bland. But this one was full of vegetables and truly fried. Best Thai food I had in Amsterdam! Thank you! and keep it up!

Name: Amara May
Review Text: Delicious Thai food, super friendly people and very affordable. I think its mostly a take away place, however, we sat in the restaurant and had a lovely time! Would recommend and will definitely come back. :)

Name: Amara May
Review Text: My order number: 18106KVF. Non-fresh ingredients. We ordered 2 portions of fish cakes and received 9 pieces?!? (Not 8 or 10, but 9, for 2 portions). The fish cake was rather full of flour instead of fish and was very sweet. Our red curry …

Name: Amara May
Review Text: A new restaurant serving incredibly good Thai food.  I’ve sampled 6 or 7 dishes so far and each one was perfect.  In my opinion it’s serving some of the best Thai food in Amsterdam and I’ve tried countless restaurants... Fresh, simple, tasty food that can’t be faulted.

Name: Amara May
Review Text: We have only ever ordered so looking forward to paying a visit soon, however the food is always amazing. Great flavour, spice levels and portions.

Name: Amara May
Review Text: Delicious and authentic Thai food in a family run restaurant. Highly recommended! Kang Massaman with tofu is my favorite dish

Name: Amara May
Review Text: Never been but ordered take away multiple times, great food and nice staff. For sure recomended to give a try, wont be disappointing.

Name: Amara May
Review Text: We love Amara May. Most authentic Thai food in Amsterdam Oost. Love it!

Name: Amara May
Review Text: If you want to eat well and for a good price this is the place to go. Quality Thai food made by an excellent Thai cook.

Name: Amara May
Review Text: Myself and the other person eating felt unwell after eating the food.

Name: Amara May
Review Text: Very nice

Name: Amara May
Review Text: Small place, mainly take out. Good food, fair prices.

Name: Amara May
Review Text: Great food and services. Best Thai in town!

Review Text: Very good restaurant! very warm welcome and also children friendly :)

Name: Amara May
Review Text: Very delicious food, friendly staff and fair price.
